projects.name: NowVPlay
projects.description: NowVPlay is a multi-portal entertainment and talent platform connecting venues, talents, and users through role-based access.

projects.name: RewardHub
projects.description: Loyalty Program Management System using NestJS, React, and PostgreSQL. The platform enables businesses to manage events, offers, vendors, tiers, projects, and members seamlessly.

projects.name: LeadFlow
projects.description: Company data management platform using NestJS, PostgreSQL, and React. Users can import a single CSV containing both companies and leads with dynamic header mapping.

projects.name: BorrowMyBoard
projects.description: Rental marketplace built for a US-based client, enabling users to rent sports equipment such as snowboards and other gear.

projects.name: HealthBridge
projects.description: Healthcare Management System built with Angular, Node.js, Express, and PostgreSQL. Features role-based access (doctors, patients, admins) for streamlined clinic/hospital operations.
